name: vatsim.rb
body:
# vatsim.rb [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/tdawe/vatsim.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/tdawe/vatsim)
vatsim.rb is a Ruby library for retrieving online status for Pilots and ATC connections on the [VATSIM] network.

[VATSIM]: http://www.vatsim.net

## Installation
    gem install vatsim

## Documentation
[http://rdoc.info/gems/vatsim][documentation]

[documentation]: http://rdoc.info/gems/vatsim

## Versions
* June 9, 2012 - Version [0.0.7] is now available
* June 3, 2012 - Version [0.0.6] is now available
* June 2, 2012 - Version [0.0.5] is now available
* May 30, 2012 - Version [0.0.4] is now available
* May 19, 2012 - Version [0.0.3] is now available
* May 16, 2012 - Version [0.0.2] is now available

[0.0.7]: https://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.7
[0.0.6]: https://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.6
[0.0.5]: https://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.5
[0.0.4]: http://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.4
[0.0.3]: http://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.3
[0.0.2]: http://rubygems.org/gems/vatsim/versions/0.0.2
tagline: Ruby library for retrieving online status for Pilots and ATC connections on the VATSIM network (www.vatsim.net)
